Package oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex

Class Summary
AbstractBucketStyleModel This class defines an abstract class to represent bucket ranges.
BarChartStyleModel Model class for BarCharStyle.
BarInfo Contains information about a column in a BarChartStyleModel, such as its colour and label/name.
Bucket A Bucket defines a range or collection of feature values.
BucketSeries BucketSeries represents a series (collection) of buckets that are produced based on a particular classification scheme.
BucketStyleModel This class defines a bucket style model for MapViewer.
CollectionBucket A CollectionBucket is a bucket that contains a collection of items or values.
CollectionStyleModel Model class for MapViewer collection style.
ColorSchemeStyleModel Model class for MapViewer color scheme style.
DotDensityStyleModel Model class for MapViewer dot density style.
HeatMapStyleModel A heat map is a 2-dimensional graphical representation using colors.
PieChartStyleModel Model class for MapViewer pie chart style.
PieSliceInfo Contains the name and color data about a pie chart slice.
RangedBucket Represents a range of values.
VariableMarkerStyleModel Model class for MapViewer variable marker style.
VariablePieChartStyleModel Model class for MapViewer variable pie chart style.
